topics.body:
Stand: UHF – Original Motion Picture Soundtrack
Power: Can manipulate radio waves, concentrating them on a target for as long as five minutes, holding them in place. After the five minutes it requires 5 D batteries to use its power again. 


How's that?
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5488b6c26368726ec45b0100#post_5488b6c26368726ec45b0100
Good enough. Now I have unlimited freedom!
...except for when I have to help with the move into our new home next week...
...and the fact that I still need to find and get into a ENG 102 class before the next semester starts...
...and the fact that I'm still in college, as an incoming freshman...

dammit life why you do this to me
[spoiler]Screw it all, I'm going to enjoy some peace and quiet while it lasts[/spoiler]
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000

topics.body:
[bq="ParagonCommander"]
Stand: Twisted Metro
Ability: This stand gives the user in depth knowledge about music and its creators. However its power is diminished if the users wants knowledge on something other than rap.[/bq]

also my friend you are forgetting about neutral milk hotel (indie rock) swans (experimental rock) hella (math rock) aphex twin (IDM) johnny cash (country) dead kennedy´s (punk) and sun 0))) (dark ambient)

topics.body:
I'm still gonna keep making stands based around users.

Stand: PegaUno
Ability: This stand is fiercely loyal to it's allies and would fight for them without question. It also boosts the fitness level of the user.
Pose:[spoiler]!http://i2.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/013/250/wii_fit_trainer_(1).jpg![/spoiler]
